content: betzus.com - Online Casino,Sportsbook,Slots,Games About betzus* Fully licensed by government of Curaçao. * Crypto & Fiat Casino.* Over 5000 Games.* Instant Deposits and Withdrawals.* 24/7 customer support. Loyalty Club* Play to earn points, and climb through the levels.* Start earning points from the first cent you spend. Bonuses* Get a 100% deposit bonus on your first four deposits, up to $2000 each.* Unlock an extra 100% bonus on your won bet when you correctly predict 10 positions in a single bet.* Boosted Odds on selected matches.  Sports Book* Experience the ultimate sports betting thrill at our sports book. With us, you'll find the best odds available, ensuring that you get the most out of your wagers. Whether it's football, basketball, tennis, or any other sport, we offer a wide range of positions for you to bet on, so you can support your favorite teams and players. Plus, we keep the excitement going with regular promotions and bonuses exclusively for our sports book users.  Game providers* Experience a premium gaming selection at betzus. Featuring top game providers like Playtech, Pragmatic Play, Yggdrasil, Red Tiger, Evolution, and more. Security * At betzus, we prioritize the security of our players above all else. With our commitment to safe transactions and ensuring your anonymity, we take great care to  protect your privacy and ensure that your sensitive data remains secure. Reach us at* betzus.com* Twitter.com/betzuscom* Instagram.com/betzuscomOn behalf of Team betzus, we wish all of our players an entertaining and fun-filled gambling experience. Good luck to each and every one of you! Let's keep this thread alive! Share your thoughts, ask questions, and join the active discussions. Together, we'll make the betzus community thrive!Start Earning Loyalty Club Points from your 1 cent bet on betzus.com become Our Loyalty Club Member.

comments.author: Hirose UK
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.From the casino that you are promoting and which will be launched soon, it looks very attractive, plus there is a deposit bonus which is quite large, even reaching a value of 1 Bitcoin and there are 4 times the deposit bonus that is given.In addition, your casino accepts not only crypto but also fiat currency which can provide more currency options for gamblers who will make deposits.Your promotional image contains the theme of roulette, cards and dice. Will these three games be the flagship games of your casino?

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Hi Betzus!Welcome to BitcoinTalk Forum. The design of the casino looks decent. I liked the animated game images. Look like you guys support a lot of Fiat payment methods. I checked your General Terms and Condition[1] page and searched for a few things. I was looking for if your casino restricts VPN usage. But I wasn't able to find any information about it. I searched the Keyword "KYC," and still, there was nothing. But in 2.1.1, you described that players must write their accurate information, including their residential address, which is a part of KYC. Does it mean players have to verify their identity on registration? [1] https://www.betzus.com/en/?helpPageContent=45420

comments.author: macson
comments.body: hi betzus, welcome to the forum, even though this site has been registered since 2017 but this is your first ANN thread on this forum.  loading of this site is very fast in my browser, apart from that the UI/UX also looks professional, it seems that your site also requires KYC on users.  do you guys have any more vigorous marketing plans in this forum, there are a lot of great campaign manager options available in this forum.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: You are welcome onboard the bitcointalk platform. It is nice having you here. At first I will commend you for taking such step by getting a copper member account this shows you are a good marketer who abide by rules. With this members here can have a view of how your casino looks like before attempt.I tried accessing your website from my end but to no avail as it is inaccessible. Do you have restrictions on countries and if you do can you let us know. Do you conduct KYC for members too ? If yes at what point is the KYC needed? Tell us so we could know.As a matter of fact, you are new here as you are yet to gain recognition and popularity here but in other to get that, I will suggest you do a campaign because you will have other casinos to contend with if you must remain relevant in this platform, you must seek the expertise of a good campaign manager @Royse777 for your campaign management.Lastly, o assume you are the representative of this casino and this should be your official announcement thread for your casino so I would advise you to be active online in responding to members here as this will tell how fast and responsive your customer care service is because members here pay attention to it as it has to do with their funds and care as well.Once again welcome onboard.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Alright, let me give my little feedback from what I have seen so far although I have created an account yet for two reasons although the second reason is out of FOMO.Let me start be commending you guys on the user interface, the design is cool for the eyes, it's not too bright and also the dark nature makes it less detrimental to the eyes.I tried creating an account but had to stop because of the promotion code space, I thought maybe since you created an ANN thread here and probably would be needing more traction to the website you could atleast try to create a promotion code for bitcointalk member that way most of us might be tempted to register and try out the casino thoroughly.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on March 29, 2023, 12:54:08 PMSignature campaign can help promoting their brands, but if it's not long term it's will be useless.Useless or not is not depending on how long the campaign runs, long terms campaign can be useless as well if the site itself can compete with other existing casinos. Always bear in mind that signature campaign is just a marketing tool to make people aware about the casino but what makes people attracted to be customers is always depending on what are offered by the casino. Your connection must be a bit unstable when you tried it so you always get message to reload the page.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: panjul07 on March 29, 2023, 01:55:15 PMUseless or not is not depending on how long the campaign runs, long terms campaign can be useless as well if the site itself can compete with other existing casinos. Always bear in mind that signature campaign is just a marketing tool to make people aware about the casino but what makes people attracted to be customers is always depending on what are offered by the casino. I would say the same. The signature Campaign should be to make aware of their existence. Do not expect massive traffic from the signature campaign. Signature campaigns show the capability of casinos. It will build its reputation on the forum day by day. If they expect significant result from signature campaign within a couple of weeks, I would say don't go for it. Signature campaign is not to boost traffic.
